WHEREAS it is expedient further to amend the Income Tax Ordinance, 2001
(XLIX of 2001) for the purposes hereinafter appearing;
AND WHEREAS, the Senate and the National Assembly are not in session
and the President of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan is satisfied that
circumstances exisl which render it necessary to take immediate action;

I . Short title and commencement.-{ I ) This Ordinance may be
called the Inconre Tax ( Second Amendment) Ordinance, 2015.
(2) It shall come inlo force at once
2. Amendment of sections 153 and 236P and Second Schedute
Ordinance XLD( of 2001.-ln the Income Tax Ordinance, 2001 (XLX of 2001),-
(l) in section 153,-
(a) in sub-section (3), in the proviso, ir.r clause (b), for semicolon
and the rvord "; and" the expression ", provided that-" shall
be substituted and thereafter the following sub-clauses shall
be added, namely:-
"(i) where the aforesaid minimurr tax for providing or
rendering services, in râ‚¬spect of sectors as specified in
clause (94) of Part IV of the Second Schedule is in
excess of tax payable under Division II of Part I of the
First Schedule, the excess amount of tax paid shall be
carried forward for adjustmcnt against tax liabilify under
the aforesaid Part ofthe subsequent tax yeart
(ii) where the excess tax. is not wholly adiusted, the
amount not adjusted shall be carried folward to the
following tax year and adjusted against tax liability
under the aforesaid Part for that year, and so on, but the
said excess shall not be carried forward to more than
five tax years immediately succeeding the tax year for
which the excess was first paid; and
(iii) the said excess amount shall not be carried forward in
case of a company for which provisions of this clause
are not applicable under clause (94) of Part IV of the
Second Schedule; and"; and
(b) after sub-section (4), the following new sub-section shall be
inserted. namely:-
"(4A) The Commissioner, on an application made by the
recipient of a payment referred to in clause (94) of Part IV
of the Second Schedule, in cases where the said recipient
has fulfilled the conditions as specified in the said clause, by

Realtime Interbank Settlement Mechanism (PRISM) transactions
or" shall be omitted; and
"(94) The provisions of clause (b) of the proviso to sub-section
(3) of section 153 shall not apply for tax year 2016 to a company
being a filer and engaged in providing or rendering freight
forwarding services, air cargo services, courier services, manpower
outsourcing services, hotel services, security guard services,
software development services, tracking services, advertising
services (other than by print or electronic media), share registrar
services, engineering services or car rental services:
Provided that the tax payable or paid on the income from
providing or rendering aforesaid services shall not be less than two
percent of the gross amount of tumover from all sources and that
the company fumishes in writing an irrevocable undertaking by the
fifteenth day of November, 2015 to present its accounts to the
Commissioner within thirty days of filing of retum, for audit of its
income tax affairs for tax year 2016.".
